articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A birthday spread sent by the dear respected Kim Jong Un was conveyed to a woman centenarian Kim In Ji residing in Phangyo County Township, Kangwon Province.
					 She was subject to maltreatment and insult as a member of the stateless nation before the liberation of the country. She could lead a worthy life with her own land for farming only after President Kim Il Sung liberated the country.
					
					 She worked hard for the benevolent socialist country. Even after becoming pensioner, she kept herself busy making efforts to do her bit for the country's agricultural production.
					
					 She likes wild vegetables and soy-based food. She is leading an optimistic life.

articles.title: DPRK to Adjust Uses of Existing Nuclear Facilities
articles.content:
DPRK to Adjust Uses of Existing Nuclear Facilities
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the General Department of Atomic Energy of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA as regards the new strategic line laid down at the March, 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear armed force to cope with the prevailing situation so as to meet the law-governing requirements of the development of the Korean revolution:
					 The field of atomic energy is faced with heavy tasks for making a positive contribution to solving the acute shortage of electricity by developing the self-reliant nuclear power industry and for bolstering up the nuclear armed force both in quality and quantity till the world is denuclearized, pursuant to the strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of the nuclear armed force. 
					
					 The General Department of Atomic Energy of the DRPK decided to adjust and alter the uses of the existing nuclear facilities, to begin with, in accordance with the line.
					
					 This will include the measure for readjusting and restarting all the nuclear facilities in Nyongbyon including uranium enrichment plant and 5MW graphite moderated reactor which had been mothballed and disabled under an agreement reached at the six-party talks in October, 2007.
					
					 This work will be put into practice without delay.

articles.title: Intensified Anti-U.S. Action Called for
articles.content:
Intensified Anti-U.S. Action Called for 
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in a statement on Monday fully supported the important decision made by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un at an operation meeting on the performance of duty of the Strategic Rocket Force of the Korean People's Army on firepower strike and the new strategic line laid down at the March Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The U.S. imperialists are the root cause of the split of the Korean nation and all sorts of its misfortune and pain and the sworn enemy of the Koreans as they are standing in the way of the reunification of Korea, the cherished desire of the nation, and working hard to ignite a nuclear war on this land, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 At this time, too, they are staging DPRK-targeted madcap joint military exercises in the sky, land and seas of south Korea under various codenames together with the south Korean warmongers after massively introducing huge aggression forces and war hardware into it.
					
					 Defying the repeated warnings of the DPRK, they let B-52, B-2A and other strategic nuclear fighter bombers make sorties to the sky above south Korea in succession for nuclear bomb-dropping drills, escalating the threat to the DPRK.
					
					 This clearly proves that the U.S. imperialists' scenario to launch a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost has reached an extremely reckless phase of its implementation.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group of traitors have worked out even a scenario to bring down the monuments to the immortality of the leaders, symbolic of Songun Korea.
					
					 As already clarified by the DPRK, gone are the days when it could have verbal exchange with them.
					
					 To wage a merciless just retaliatory war is the only way of rooting out the source of the danger of a nuclear war on this land and build a peaceful and prosperous reunified thriving nation where all Koreans live together.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and pro-U.S. group of traitors should clearly know that the moment when they ignite a war of aggression will be a beginning of their miserable fate as it will precipitate their final destruction.
					
					 When they unleash a war against the DPRK, its disasters will be brought to the south Koreans.
					
					 The south Korean people should turn out as one in the just action against the U.S. to resolutely foil the anti-DPRK nuclear war racket kicked up by the U.S. imperialists and the puppet group, clearly understanding what is the root cause of the present situation and what disastrous consequences will be entailed by it.

articles.title: KSDP Will Make Every Possible Effort for Earlier Conclusion of Showdown with U.S.
articles.content:
KSDP Will Make Every Possible Effort for Earlier Conclusion of Showdown with U.S.
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party (KSDP) made public a statement on Tuesday in support of the important decision made by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un at an operation meeting on the Korean People's Army Strategic Rocket Force's performance of duty for firepower strike and the special statement released by the government, political parties and public organizations of the DPRK to implement it.
					 The prevailing grave situation calls upon all Koreans in the north, the south and overseas to dynamically turn out in a nationwide all-people resistance to sweep away all the U.S. imperialists and the pro-U.S. sycophants and traitors from the earth, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The new strategic line laid down at the March, 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea which called for simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear armed force is the most just revolutionary one as it correctly indicates a shortcut to coping with the prevailing grave situation and opening up a bright future of the nation as early as possible.
					
					 The KSDP, which regards independence as its idea, is convinced that under the present situation the strategy for achieving reunification and the way to be followed by the nation lie in countering the U.S. nuclear blackmail with a just nuclear strike and a provocation with a prompt great war for national reunification. 
					
					 Now that the DPRK's armed forces for self-defence have gone into a practical military action and the inter-Korean relations have been put in the state of war, any provocation to infringe upon the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK even a bit will not escape a prompt physical strike.
					
					 Various political parties and organizations and people of different social standings in south Korea should properly understand who is harasser of peace in face of this grim situation and turn out in a just struggle against the U.S. and the wicked confrontation maniacs keen to ignite a nuclear war, irrespective of ideology, political view and religious belief. 
					
					 The KSDP Central Committee and all its members will make every possible effort to bring earlier the day of putting an end to the long-standing history of the confrontation with the U.S. by concerted efforts of the nation.

articles.title: Patriotic Struggle against U.S. High-Handed and Arbitrary Practices Called for by Religious Body
articles.content:
Patriotic Struggle against U.S. High-Handed, Arbitrary Practices Called for by Religious Body
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The Religious Believers Council of Korea said in a statement issued on Tuesday:
					 The council fully supports the important decision made by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, the supreme incarnation of love and trust, in connection with the fact that the U.S. imperialists' aggressive moves to violate the DPRK's sovereignty and the dignity of the supreme leadership of the country have reached an extreme phase.
					
					 The council calls on all the compatriots at home and abroad to turn out in the sacred patriotic struggle against the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the U.S. imperialists, the chieftain of evils, in order to protect peace and justice, reflecting the will of the believers of the DPRK who hold justice and truth dearer than their own lives.
					
					 Those who are fond of playing with fire are bound to perish in the flames and those evils are bound to meet a punishment by Heaven. 
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean military gangsters seeking to inflict a nuclear holocaust upon the peace-loving humankind are bound to perish in the boiling cauldron as they are the most barbarous Satans in the world.
					
					 The U.S. nuclear blackmail should be countered with a merciless nuclear attack, its war of aggression with a great war of justice for national reunification. This is a strong message of the DPRK and represents the unanimous view of our religionists.
					
					 Now is the time for all the religionists who truly wish for peace and justice to devote their heart and soul to the practical action against the hateful peace wreckers and war provocateurs, not merely concerning and worrying about the destiny of the nation like a public-spirited man.
					
					 They should drive the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces, the root cause of all sorts of misfortune and pain, out of this land, keenly aware that genuine religion for love and peace and embodiment of justice lie in protecting national dignity and sovereignty.  
					
					 The Religious Believers Council of Korea is firmly convinced that the peace-loving religious organizations and religionists in south Korea who love a bright future of the nation and peace will turn out in the patriotic sacred struggle to protect justice, keenly aware of their mission.

articles.title: Short Biography of Honorary Vice-President of SPA Presidium Choe Yong Rim
articles.content:
Short Biography of Honorary Vice-President of SPA Presidium Choe Yong Rim
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The following is the short biography of Choe Yong Rim elected honorary vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK at the 7th Session of the 12th SPA held on Monday.
					 He was born in Kyonghung County, North Hamgyong Province on November 20, Juche 19 (1930).
					
					 He joined the People's Army in July, Juche 39 (1950).
					
					 He received the qualifications of economy engineer after graduating from a university.
					
					 He has worked as premier of the Cabinet since June, Juche 99 (2010) after holding the posts of instructor, head of a section, vice department director, first vice department director and department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, chief secretary of the Kumsusan Assembly Hall, vice-premier of the Administration Council, director of the Central Public Prosecutors Office, secretary general of the SPA Presidium and chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: Short Biography of Premier Pak Pong Ju
articles.content:
Short Biography of Premier Pak Pong Ju
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The following is the short biography of Pak Pong Ju elected premier of the Cabinet at the 7th Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK held on Monday:
					 He was born in Kim Chaek City, North Hamgyong Province on April 10, Juche 28 (1939).
					
					 He received the qualifications of machine building engineer after graduating from Tokchon University of Technology.
					
					 He has worked as director of the Light Industry Department of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea since April Juche 101 (2012) after holding the posts of vice department director of the provincial party committee, chief secretary of the party committee of the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex, vice department director of the WPK Central Committee, minister of Chemical Industry, premier of the Cabinet and first vice department director of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The art troupe of Koreans in Japan headed by Ha Yong Su visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Tuesday. It came here to participate in the Third April Spring People's Art Festival.
					 The members of the art troupe laid a bouquet before the statues before paying tribute to them.

articles.title: More Local Army-People Meetings Held to Support Statement of KPA Supreme Command
articles.content:
More Local Army-People Meetings Held to Support Statement of KPA Supreme Command
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Army-people meetings were held in South Phyongan, Jagang and South Hamgyong provinces Monday to support the statement of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army and win victory in all people's final decisive battle against the aggressors including the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group of traitors.
					 Speeches were made by representatives of the KPA, the Worker-Peasant Red Guards, the Young Red Guards and the discharged soldiers.
					
					 The speakers said that all the service personnel and people are fully determined to demonstrate the dignity and power of Songun Korea in the spirit of annihilating the enemies, upon hearing the statement of the KPA Supreme Command and the news that the dear respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un convened an urgent operation meeting on the Strategic Rocket Force's performance of duty on firepower strike. 
					
					 They declared that they would devotedly protect the monuments to the immortality of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, symbols of the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, eternally hold them in high esteem and defend Kim Jong Un at the cost of their lives.
					
					 They stressed the need for the service personnel to round off their combat methods and operations in the direction of increasing the pivotal role of the nuclear force in all aspects of war deterrence and strategy for fighting a war and to wipe out the enemies at a single strike once they dare come in attack.
					
					 The members of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and the Young Red Guards should tightly hold their arms and deal sledge-hammer blows at the enemies, so they may not run riot again, and devote their youth and lives to the fight for the party and leader, the country and its people, they noted.
					
					 They underlined the need for the discharged soldiers to wipe out the reckless U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group of traitors to the last man by giving full play to the wisdom and courage of each beating a hundred enemies which they had cultivated during the days of military service.
					
					  The meetings were followed by the demonstrations of their participants.

articles.title: More Local Army-People Meetings Held
articles.content:
More Local Army-People Meetings Held
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Army-people meetings took place in South Hwanghae, Kangwon and Ryanggang provinces Tuesday to support the statement of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and win victory in all-people's final decisive battle against the aggressors including the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group of traitors.
					 The statement was read out to be followed by speeches by representatives of the KPA, the Worker-Peasant Red Guards, the Young Red Guards and the discharged soldiers.
					
					 The speakers said that all the service personnel and people are turning out in the all-people final decisive battle to defend the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of its supreme leadership, upon hearing the statement of the KPA Supreme Command and the news that the dear respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un made an important decision at the operation meeting on the Strategic Rocket Force's performance of duty for firepower strike.
					
					 The important decision made by Kim Jong Un is a decisive declaration of justice to provide a landmark occasion in putting an indefinite end to the long-standing history of showdown with the U.S. imperialists and open a new page of history, they noted.
					
					 The desperate moves of the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces would only harden the DPRK's will to take a thousand-fold revenge upon them and precipitate a miserable end of the foolish warmaniacs who have pushed the situation to an extreme phase, they said. 
					
					 The meetings were followed by demonstrations staged by their participants, shouting slogans.
					
					 Present at the meetings were officials of the local party and power organs and working people's organizations, service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials and other people of industrial establishments and farms and teachers and students of universities and colleges.

articles.title: Conference of Journalists Union of Korea Held
articles.content:
Conference of Journalists Union of Korea Held
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A conference of the Journalists Union of Korea (JUK) took place at the Grand People's Study House Tuesday.
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and delegates elected at the conferences of media, armed forces organs and provincial (municipal) unions.
					
					 The conference decided as its agenda items "On tasks of the Journalists Union of Korea for letting the journalists and media persons perform their duty and role as trumpeters for advance in shattering the enemies' moves to stifle the DPRK and powerfully pushing forward the building of an economic power" and "On the revision of the rules of the Journalists Union of Korea".
					
					 Hwang Yong Bo, chairman of the Central Committee of the JUK, made a report on the first agenda item.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un loves the media persons, leading the media to become powerful ideological weapon conducive to accomplishing the cause of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Media men have played the role as the ideological standard-bearers who are arousing all service personnel and people to the great surge for building an economic power and improving the standard of people's living, true to the high intention of the Workers' Party of Korea, they said.
					
					 They stressed the need for the media persons to successfully discharge their mission and role in the drive to glorify the Kim Jong Un's era as centuries-old victory and change.
					
					 A decision on the first agenda item was adopted at the conference.
					
					 Then the second agenda item was discussed.
					
					 A decision on revising the rules of the union was adopted with the unanimous approval of the delegates.

articles.title: New Strategic Line, Succession of Line of Simultaneously Developing Economy and Defense
articles.content:
New Strategic Line, Succession of Line of Simultaneously Developing Economy and Defense
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The historic March 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, held on Sunday, set forth a new strategic line on carrying on the economic construction and the building of nuclear armed forces simultaneously under the prevailing situation to meet the legitimate requirement of the developing revolution.
					 This line is aimed to beef up nuclear armed forces qualitatively and quantitatively with the U.S. nuclear threat to the Democratic People's Republic of Korea being escalated.
					
					 The line makes it possible for the DPRK to exert bigger efforts on economic construction while bolstering up the nation's defense capabilities with self-defensive nuclear armed forces.
					
					 It is a brilliant succession and development on a new higher stage of the unique line of simultaneously developing the economy and national defense, advanced and steadily maintained by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 At the 5th Plenary Meeting of the 4th WPK Central Committee in December Juche 51 (1962), President Kim Il Sung advanced a unique and revolutionary line of developing the nation's economic construction and defense buildup simultaneously.
					
					 The President chose the line with the belief that a country should defend itself with its own efforts.
					
					 The strict implementation of the line turned the DPRK into a country, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defense, in the 1960s.
					
					 The country's self-reliant defense capabilities grew stronger under the Songun (military-first) politics pursued by leader Kim Jong Il. He had worked heart and soul to increase the military capability, stressing that top priority should be given to the military affairs and the defense industry serves as the key to building a thriving country.
					
					 The new strategic line represents the steadfast will of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un to build a powerful socialist nation on this land by successfully concluding the showdown with the U.S. by dint of the nuclear armed forces.

articles.title: DPRK People Hail New Strategic Line of WPK
articles.content:
DPRK People Hail New Strategic Line of WPK
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Workers in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have hailed a new strategic line of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), set forth at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of its Central Committee, expressing their will to remain faithful to the WPK's leadership.
					 Han U Gil, a work-team head of Steel Workshop No.1 of the Chollima Steel Complex, told KCNA:
					
					 "The new strategic line on carrying on the economic construction and the building of nuclear armed forces simultaneously is the most revolutionary line as it makes it possible to bolster up the nation's defense capabilities and build a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 It is our unshakable will to inherit the spirit of preceding generations that faithfully followed the WPK's leadership, rejecting the reactionaries' sophism that machines can not provide food."
					
					 Chon Ki Chol, a worker of the Posan Iron Works, said:
					
					 "DPRK's nuclear armed forces are what keep the Korean nation alive.
					
					 The new strategic line serves as a definite guarantee for defending our socialism and winning the final victory in an all-out action against the imperialists.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists should be well aware that the military technical superiority is no longer a monopoly of the imperialists and gone are the days when they could threaten and blackmail the DPRK with A-bombs.
					
					 We, workers, will carry out the tasks laid down at the March Plenary Meeting, with a firm conviction that the victory is in store for our country led by the WPK."

articles.title: Passenger Traffic College Opens in DPRK
articles.content:
Passenger Traffic College Opens in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang Passenger Traffic College has opened with the new school year beginning in the DPRK on Monday.
					 Pak Chol Ung, an official of the college, told KCNA:
					
					 "Intensifying education at factory colleges is one of the important works for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The college will direct efforts to giving multimedia and IT education to students so that they can solve scientific and technological problems arising in hands-on activities."
					
					 Pak Chan Ju, a student of the college, said:
					
					 "As one of the first entrants of the college, I will top the class in study, mindful of leader Kim Jong Il's instructions on looking out over the world with feet planted on this land."
					
					 The five-year college has such departments as mechanical engineering, electrical engineering and metal engineering. It is open five days a week.
					
					 Its graduates will be granted engineership.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Prize Sports Contest Opens
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Prize Sports Contest Opens
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The Mangyongdae Prize Sports Contest was opened with due ceremony at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street Tuesday in the run-up to the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Its participants will compete in nearly 40 events including football, basketball, volleyball, weightlifting, wrestling, judo, field hockey, track and field, gymnastics in Pyongyang, Chongjin, Wonsan, Nampho and other cities.
					
					 Minister of Physical Culture and Sports Ri Jong Mu made an opening address.
					
					 At the end of the opening ceremony there took place the men's basketball game between the Sports Team of Kim Hyong Jik University of Education and the Sports Team of Pyongyang University of Architecture.

articles.title: New Book Off Press in DPRK
articles.content:
New Book Off Press in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Vol. 101 of the collection of reminiscences "Among the People" was brought out in the DPRK.
					 The book contains 20 reminiscences telling about the wise leadership and noble virtue of President Kim Il Sung, who performed immortal exploits for the country and its people, era and revolution.
					
					 Reminiscences "The prospect of our revolution is bright, indeed" tell a touching story that the President, who laid down an eternal foundation for the successful advance and accomplishment of revolutionary cause of Juche, said Kim Jong Il era would be a brighter and prosperous one in the future, too.
					
					 Reminiscences "Ideological work should be kept ahead of all other affairs" deal with the fact that the President gave an instruction on giving priority to the ideological revolution in order to eradicate the remnants of old ideas from the minds of the peasants after listening to the speech of a three-revolution team member at the national meeting of agriculture.
					
					 Reminiscences "Life of a hero under the care of sun" deal with the loving care shown by the President to ensure that the soul of Hero Ri Su Bok lives on while visiting the hero's house. Reminiscences "Precious instructions on the revolutionary etiquette" deal with the instruction given by the President to establish etiquette as required by the era.
					
					 The book contains some reminiscences dealing with the wise leadership and loving care of the President, who made indefatigable efforts for economic development and the improvement of the people's living standard.
					
					 There are in the book reminiscences dealing with the President's guidance over education, sports and other fields.
					
					 Reminiscences "Setting store by patriotism of Koreans in Japan" tell the story that the President showed loving care to ensure that a factory under construction thanks to the patriotic devotion of Korean scientists and technicians in Japan went operational earlier than scheduled.
					
					 The book contains reminiscences dealing with the instructions given by the President to ensure that the properties of the country and its people were valued and independence was adhered to in foreign trade and his tireless efforts to achieve national reunification and the human cause of independence.

articles.title: New Kind of Natural Graphite Brush Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Kind of Natural Graphite Brush Developed in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A new kind of natural graphite brush was developed by scientists of the Natural Graphite Development Center in the DPRK. Made with locally available raw materials, it is based on know-how in each process of manufacturing.
					 The development paved a way to turn out quality graphite brushes with raw materials abundant in the country, laying a solid basis for supplying enough electric brushes for motors and generators to different economic sectors.
					
					 The brush has no adverse effect on environment. It was already tested at the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, local mines and farms and in other countries.
					
					 With no sparks and less abrasion, it is highly appreciated by users.
					
					 The International Electrotechnical Commission (IEC) announced that the brush is 28 percent higher in electric conductivity and 50 percent stronger in intensity, although 7 percent smaller in density, than other kinds.
					
					 The brush won the international standard (IEC/PAS).

articles.title: Changsong Confucian School, Korea's Architectural Heritage
articles.content:
Changsong Confucian School, Korea's Architectural Heritage
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Changsong Confucian School in Changsong County, North Phyongan Province, is one of the historical relics of Korean architecture.
					 The building was set up in the early days of the Feudal Joson Dynasty (1392-1910) as the first institution to teach children of the aristocratic class feudalistic Confucianism. It is written on the ridgepole of the building that it was rebuilt in 1765.
					
					 In the front of the building is Myongryun Hall, 15.4 meters wide in facade and 5.6 meters in flank, which has no walls.
					
					 At the back of the hall are Tong-mu and So-mu, gabled houses with double eaves built on a terraced ground facing each other. Taesong Hall which stands behind them is also a gabled house with double eaves, measuring 11.15 meters wide in facade and 7.1 meters in flank. Its pillars and roof brackets are exquisitely dovetailed. 
					
					 Changsong Confucian School has unique features of composition and placement common to such buildings of those days, thus representing the contemporary architecture and management of Confucian schools.

articles.title: Pyongyang City to Be Bedecked with Flowers on Spring Holiday
articles.content:
Pyongyang City to Be Bedecked with Flowers on Spring Holiday
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Big efforts have been made for the cultivation of flowers across the country to bedeck streets, parks and pleasure grounds with the approach of the Day of the Sun (April 15), the birthday of President Kim Il Sung.
					 In Pyongyang, many flowers of different species have been cultivated at various units including the Pyongyang Floriculture Institute and the Pyongyang City Floricultural Farm.
					
					 Choe Sok Chol, manager of the Pyongyang City Floricultural Farm, told KCNA:
					
					 "It is not so easy to make various species of flowers bloom all at once in a fixed time.
					
					 But, we have done our best to provide a sea of flowers, taking deep care of every cultivation process. Now, all flowering plants have begun to take buds though it is still chilly.
					
					 Streets in Pyongyang will take on a new look with the approach of the April holiday."

articles.title: More Parks in Pyongyang to Be Face-lifted
articles.content:
More Parks in Pyongyang to Be Face-lifted 
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A number of parks are going to be face-lifted in Pyongyang City this year.
					 In this regard, KCNA met Ri Il Song, an official of the Pyongyang City People's Committee. 
					
					 Ri said:
					
					 The parks will be furnished with various kinds of sports and amusement facilities as well as welfare facilities. And new pavements will be built and lots of new species of trees planted there.
					
					 It is planned to build in the park of Sungri-dong No. 2 in Rangnang District a resting place covering a thousand square meters, a skate park and a volleyball court and install sports and amusement facilities for children.
					
					 Volleyball, basketball, tennis and badminton courts and a skate park will appear in Kangan Park of Phyongchon District.
					
					 The city has already finished designing and secured building materials and sports and amusement facilities, with a goal to carry out the improvement project of those parks in a short span of time. Meanwhile, a work is progressing to raise saplings of trees and flowering plants needed for greening of the parks.
					
					 Nearly 20 parks were renovated in Pyongyang last year.

articles.title: Truth Is Bound to Prevail over Falsity
articles.content:
Truth Is Bound to Prevail over Falsity
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- More facts proving the provocative nature and danger of the U.S. hostile acts against the DPRK have been disclosed, sparking off a fright at home and abroad.
					 As known, the U.S. increased the number of the U.S. troops in south Korea by more than 11 000 in the past a few years. Lethal weapons and units that had already been brought to south Korea and those which the U.S. is mulling bringing for reinforcement this year are all latest means for mounting preemptive nuclear attacks from the ground and air and for carrying out a chemical warfare against the DPRK.
					
					 When they are put together with the war means it handed over to the south Korean puppet forces, that will be enough to fight a war.
					
					 The fact proves that the DPRK's launch of satellite for peaceful purposes and its nuclear test for self-defence were not only the reasons why the U.S. is intensifying its provocations.
					
					 The U.S. reinforcements in south Korea and its moves to provoke the DPRK are aimed to serve its strategy toward the DPRK which calls for seizing control of the whole Korean Peninsula, a strategic vantage point in Northeast Asia, and holding military hegemony in the region.
					
					 The prevailing situation is attributable to the U.S. sinister scenario to aggravate the situation on the Korean Peninsula and ignite the second Korean war, a nuclear war, at any cost this year marking the 60th anniversary of the Korean Armistice Agreement.
					
					 This has brought into bolder relief the truth that the U.S. and hostile forces' moves for harassing peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula over the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes and its nuclear test for self-defence are a brigandish act of turning white to black.
					
					 This is why the DPRK has taken a series of toughest countermeasures while strongly rejecting the UN Security Council's "resolutions on sanctions" against it.
					
					 It was aimed to defend the justice and truth of humankind, to say nothing of the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK from the U.S. high-handed and arbitrary practices and the UNSC's despicable act of kowtowing to the U.S., bereft of impartiality.
					
					 Truth is not proven by voting.
					
					 An answer to it is the outcry of a scientist who laid down his life to defend truth, saying that still the earth moves despite religious persecution in the dark medieval age.
					
					 The shining victory won by the then young DPRK in the last Korean war after repelling the invasion by the U.S. imperialists, which fabricated even UN "resolution" while boasting itself of being the "strongest" in the world, and their allied forces has become a model of invincibility of justice and truth in the modern times.
					
					 In the present highly civilized world, where independence has become the trend of the times, just a few countries possessed of nukes can not represent the ideologies, social systems, traditions and civilization of other countries, let alone decided their destinies.
					
					 Such an act can no longer work on the DPRK that firmly defended itself in the past even though it had no nuclear weapons, and now has become a full-fledged nuclear weapons state. 
					
					 If the U.S. and its followers persist in the moves to stifle the DPRK, they will get thousand-fold merciless retaliatory blows from Songun Korea which rose up to defend justice and truth.
					
					 It is the inevitability of history that justice and truth prevail over injustice and falsity.

articles.title: Japan Will Never Be Able to Escape Stern Judgment of History: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Japan Will Never Be Able to Escape Stern Judgment of History: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Japan, the worst human rights abuser, is taking the lead in the smear campaign against the DPRK in the international arena.
					 It behaved so despicably as raising both hands in support of the recent "resolution on setting up a special committee to investigate the human rights record in north of Korea" adopted by the UN Human Rights Council.
					
					 Japanese Foreign Minister Kishida and minister in charge of the "issue of abductees" Furuya let loose such spate of nonsense as "Japan highly appreciates the resolution adopted without any voting" and "it strongly hopes to see a special committee formed soon and investigation started so that it may prove effective as a lever for pressure".
					
					 Meanwhile, Japanese Prime Minister Abe jabbered that the issue of "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army should be left to historians and experts to be discussed at a quiet platform and that it should not be handled as a political and diplomatic issue.
					
					 Japan's behavior in the international arena over the so-called "human rights" is more brazen-faced than anything else.
					
					 Japan has no face to talk about other's human rights as it has shunned the redemption of its crime-woven past for decades by drenching the continent with the blood shed by Asians in the last century.
					
					 The Abe government has gone to extremes in its approach towards such shameless acts as distorting the history and denying the past crimes including the issue of "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army, a hideous crime against humanity.
					
					 Abe dismissed as a serious error the news report that he "apologized" for the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army at the talks with the then U.S. president in April, 2007 when the former was in office.
					
					 There take place a series of despicable acts in Japan. A rock troupe, ultra-right music band of Japan, composed songs insulting the victims of the sexual slavery to be disseminated and posted on websites was a composite photograph insulting a girl bust disclosing the sexual slavery as a prostitute. This is the picture of Japan.
					
					 According to the disclosure made by a BBC correspondent in Tokyo, the explanation from 1931 to 1945 in a historic textbook of Japan is just 19 pages out of 357 pages in all. This textbook has just one sentence of explanation about each the issue of the "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army and the Nanjing massacre called the worst tragedy in the 20th century as they killed 300 000 Chinese in 1937.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Abe government hopes to see curriculum amended so that youngsters may feel more proud of the country's history than now, the broadcasting service added.
					
					 Japan is so impudent.
					
					 The past crimes can never change with distortion and denial of them. Resolutions on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army were adopted at the Senate of the New York State Assembly in the wake of the House of Representatives of the U.S. and the California State Assembly.
					
					 The resolutions branded the sexual slavery as crime against humanity and as one of the worst flesh traffic in the 20th century, revealing that the Japanese government forced more than 200 000 women into the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 A lot of monuments disclosing the sexual slavery are being erected one after another in different parts of the U.S. including California and New York.
					
					 With no sleight of hand can Japan ever escape a stern judgment of history.
					
					 The reckless acts oblivious of lesson are bound to invite a fresh ruin.

articles.title: S. Korea-U.S. Plan for War Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korea-U.S. Plan for War Flailed
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea and the chief of the south Korean military signed a "plan for jointly countering the provocation of a local war", the keynote of which is to provoke an all-out nuclear war.
					 The plan specifies detailed operations for expansion of a local war to an all-out nuclear war with a joint counteraction of the south Korean and U.S. forces. It also refers to military personnel, operational means and different methods for war provocation.
					
					 The U.S. is now describing the plan as a measure to reduce the possibility of war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 But, it is based on the U.S. sinister scheme to carry on an all-out nuclear war involving its forces from its mainland and the Pacific, with a local war to be launched by the south Korean military as a pretext.
					
					 The plan provides the U.S. imperialists with a legal ground for them to take part in any armed conflict between the north and the south of Korea.
					
					 Accordingly, it is quite natural for the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to take a countermeasure now that the U.S. nuclear war scenario has entered an uncontrollable, practical stage.
					
					 In this regard, Ri Jang Hui, an officer of the Korean People's Army, told KCNA:
					
					 "'The plan for jointly countering the provocation of a local war' is no more than a scenario for provocation of a total war.
					
					 Servicepersons of my unit will reduce the aggressors and their military bases to ashes, if provoked."

articles.title: S. Korea's Purchase of Weaponry from U.S. under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korea's Purchase of Weaponry from U.S. under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held the 132nd rally for peace and disarmament outside the building of the "Ministry of Defence" on Mar. 30 in protest against the purchase of weaponry to increase the danger of war. 
					 The speakers denounced the military authorities for mulling purchasing F-35 and other U.S.-made weapons by spending money collected as taxes from civilians.
					
					 They voiced opposition to the introduction of fighters of the next generation, holding that the "plan to jointly cope with the provocation of a local war" signed by the military authorities of south Korea and the U.S. recently is contrary to the international norms as it is a dangerous document for escalating a local war through the prompt involvement of U.S. forces in contingency on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 They said the people need an army which serves the purpose of achieving co-prosperity of the nation and putting an end to the national division, not one that antagonizes the compatriots and perpetuates the division under the signboard of "security".

articles.title: Action Staged in Demand of Solution to Issue of Registration Fee in S. Korea
articles.content:
Action Staged in Demand of Solution to Issue of Registration Fee in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Members of the People's Headquarters for Halving Registration Fee and students of south Korea held a meeting in Chonggye Plaza in Seoul on March 29 demanding the "government" authorities opt for the settlement of the issue of registration fee.
					 The speakers at the meeting accused the present chief executive of reneging on her promise to halve the registration fee so as to lessen the burden of the students.
					
					 They continued: A majority of parents are groaning as they are unable to pay snow-balling registration fee and students' dream of learning is trampled down. But the "government" is paying no heed to this.
					
					 They declared that they would continue their actions till the issue of the registration fee is solved. 
					
					 On the same day, a demonstration was staged by people of various social standings in demand of the halved registration fee. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the security authorities hurled six companies of police into the scene, creating a terror-ridden atmosphere

articles.title: Koreans in China Denounce U.S., S. Korean War Maneuvers against DPRK
articles.content:
Koreans in China Denounce U.S., S. Korean War Maneuvers against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The Shenyang City Branch of the General Association of Koreans in China held a meeting on March 26 in protest against the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime's reckless moves to incite confrontation and ignite a war against the DPRK.
					 Read out there was a report of the Korean Central News Agency "Nullifying Korean Armistice Agreement serves as a decisive measure to put an end to the state of war on the Korean Peninsula".
					
					 It was followed by an issue of a protest statement "Let's resolutely foil the reckless confrontation and war maneuvers of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group of traitors!"
					
					 The statement said that all the Koreans under the branch denounce with towering national indignation the anti-DPRK nuclear war racket kicked up by the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers who are going reckless to inflict a nuclear holocaust upon the Korean nation.
					
					 We will join all other compatriots in turning out in all-people resistance and a just patriotic war to resolutely foil the reckless confrontation and war moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group of traitors and protect the national sovereignty and dignity and thus build a reunified and prosperous thriving country in Korea, it added.

articles.title: Patriotic War for Reunification Called for by Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Patriotic War for Reunification Called for by Koreans in Japan 
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Officials of the organizations of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) released statements on March 29 in support of the statement issued by the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Ri Jong Man, managing director of the Standing Council of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan, said all the Korean workers in commerce in Japan would resolutely turn out in the patriotic sacred war for national reunification in hearty response to the statement of the KPA Supreme Command.
					
					 Kim Cha Dol, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, said: All the Korean youth and students in Japan positively support the just struggle of the young people in the homeland and will join them in working in a strained and militant manner with towering hatred for the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Kang Chu Ryon, chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, said all the Korean women in Japan can never pardon the war criminals, provokers hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Hwa Hyo, chairman of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, said the reckless acts of the human scum to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK deserve the severest punishment, adding that rabid dogs should be beaten with sticks.
					
					 Ri Chong Gyong, managing director of the Standing Council of the Korean Sportsmen's Federation in Japan, said all the sports organizations and sportspersons under the federation would turn out as one in the sacred war for resolutely frustrating war moves of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppets and safeguarding justice in view of the prevailing grave situation.
					
					 Kim Jong Su, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan, expressed will to wield higher their patriotic pens to protect independence and justice.
					
					 Pak Tong Ho, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Students in Japan, said all the Korean students in Japan would positively join the people in the homeland in their just struggle for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, called upon all Koreans to turn out in the struggle against the reckless rackets of the U.S. and south Korean warmongers for a war against the DPRK.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated by Koreans in Khabarovsk Region of Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated by Koreans in Khabarovsk Region of Russia
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated by the United Confederation of Koreans in Khabarovsk on March 28.
					  Choe Song Jong, chairman of the confederation, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse events including meeting and seminar on the immortal feats of the President, the Juche idea and Songun idea on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Peru
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was published in booklet by Grafica Aj Hermanos Publishing House in Peru on March 26.
					 The work, published in April 6, Juche 101(2012), clarifies that it is a principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 It set forth the tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK as a glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Internet Website of Brazilian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Internet Website of Brazilian Organization
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The detailed gist of "2. Composition" of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Theory of Musical Art" was posted on the website of the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea on March 25.
					 The work, made public on July 17, Juche 80 (1991), clarifies that the music is the art of melody and the verse-song is a main form of the people's music.
					
					 And it set forth the main principles arising in combining the national musical instruments and western musical instruments.
					
					 It indicates that the arrangement is a creation and various kinds and forms of music should be created.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Germany
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Germany
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A German preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated on March 27.
					 Torsten Schoevitz, acting chairman of the Communist Party of Germany, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events praising the immortal revolutionary exploits of Kim Il Sung and introducing Songun Korea.

articles.title: DPRK's Measures for Self-defence Supported by Regional Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Measures for Self-defence Supported by Regional Organization
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions issued a statement on March 27 supporting the DPRK's measures for self-defence to cope with the U.S. moves for aggression against it.
					 The statement accused the U.S. of staging military exercises under the simulated conditions of a nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					 Noting that prompt measures taken by the DPRK are just, the statement continued:
					
					 The Korean people are defending the sovereignty of the country and that of the neighboring countries which may become next victims of aggressors.
					
					 The U.S. should immediately stop the war exercises for aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 We fervently call on the governments and peoples of all countries to fully support the DPRK in its struggle for defending the sovereignty of the country and achieving peaceful reunification.

articles.title: U.S. Reckless Nuclear Threat to DPRK Denounced by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
U.S. Reckless Nuclear Threat to DPRK Denounced by Swiss Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea denounced the U.S. reckless nuclear threat to the DPRK.
					 The organizations in their joint statement on March 23 assailed the U.S. for introducing nuclear strike means including B-52 into the Korean Peninsula, threatening the DPRK. 
					
					 Such an unprecedentedly grave situation as nuclear confrontation is now prevailing on the Korean Peninsula, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK is standing up against the brigandish nuclear threat of the U.S. with powerful nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK are now firmly determined to take revenge upon the U.S. imperialist aggressors and fully ready to sternly punish the enemy once the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, the invincible and iron-willed Songun commander, issues an order.
					
					 The armed forces of the DPRK will blow up the enemy's strongholds.
					
					 The peace-loving DPRK does not want a war, but will never tolerate any repeated moves of the imperialists to ignite a war.
					
					 We resolutely denounce the U.S. moves for a nuclear war and fully support all measures taken by the DPRK.

articles.title: UNSC's "Resolutions on Sanctions" against DPRK under Fire Abroad
articles.content:
UNSC's "Resolutions on Sanctions" against DPRK under Fire Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Personages of South Africa and Myanmar denounced the UN Security Council's "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					 Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party who doubles as chairman of the South African Association of Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People, in a statement on March 25 said that the "resolutions on sanctions" adopted by the UNSC against the DPRK, a sovereign state, are a wanton violation of its right to legitimate satellite launch.
					
					 This amounts to escalating the racket of the U.S. and its followers to stifle the DPRK, the statement noted, adding: They should stop any act of straining the situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The statement extended full support to the Korean people in their just struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country.
					
					 Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, in a statement on March 19 strongly rejected the UNSC's "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					
					 The statement said that the satellite launched by the DPRK is aimed to develop its science and technology and improve its people's living standard and its nuclear test was conducted to protect the country's sovereignty and people's right to existence, to all intents and purposes.
					
					 The U.S. moves compelled the DPRK to take stronger countermeasures for defending its sovereignty and security, it stressed, adding:
					
					 The Korean people will never pardon the U.S. moves to justify its hostile policy toward the DPRK, create an atmosphere of international sanctions to stifle it, but intensify space development and nuclear activities, its independent and legitimate rights.

articles.title: British Organizations Hail Statement of KPA Supreme Command
articles.content:
British Organizations Hail Statement of KPA Supreme Command
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association made public a joint statement on March 27 to hail the statement of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The statement accused the U.S. imperialists and their followers of prodding the UN Security Council into cooking up "resolutions on sanctions" to stifle socialist Korea of Juche and staging war exercises against it, pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to an uncontrollable phase.
					
					 This is a grave provocation to the DPRK, an indication of the sinister attempt of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces to bring down its socialist system and break the will and faith of the Korean people, it noted, and continued:
					
					 They should bear in mind that they will have to pay a dear price.
					
					 The DPRK will never yield to the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 If a war breaks out, it will become a war of justice, a war for national liberation and a revolutionary war against the U.S. imperialists and the class enemies.
					
					 The DPRK will give full play to the tremendous muscle and all potentials built up by it so far, deal merciless blows at the U.S. imperialists and achieve a final victory under the Songun revolutionary leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Swedish Party Leader Accuses U.S.
articles.content:
Swedish Party Leader Accuses U.S.
						
 Pyongyang. April 2 (KCNA) -- Anders Karlsson, chairman of the Communist Party in Sweden, posted on its website on March 8 an article disclosing the nature of the U.S. as harasser of peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					 An acute atmosphere in which a war can not be ruled out is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula, he said, branding the U.S. and south Korea as the forces pushing the situation to such a serious phase.
					
					 He recalled that the U.S. instigated the UN Security Council to criticize the DPRK's legitimate satellite launch as illegal and cook up a "resolution on sanctions" against it, a wanton violation of international law and its sovereignty.
					
					 The U.S. threatened the DPRK with nukes in 1950 and introduced nuclear weapons into south Korea, staging DPRK-targeted nuclear war exercises every year, he noted, adding:
					
					 Another "resolution on sanctions" fabricated by the U.S. and the UNSC against the DPRK on March 7 aggravated the situation on the Korean Peninsula and increased the danger of a war.
					
					 This disclosed the irresponsibility of the UNSC.
					
					 In this regard, the DPRK declared the nullification of the Korean Armistice Agreement (AA).
					
					 Citing facts to prove that AA has so far been systematically scrapped by the U.S, he went on:
					
					 The DPRK's decision on nullifying AA does not mean that it is ready to start a war.
					
					 It only declared its stand to defend itself from any attack with means in its possession.
					
					 The U.S. and its allies and south Korea had better ponder over the consequences to be entailed by their provocations before invading the DPRK.

articles.title: Russian Support Statements of DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Support Statements of DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Russian organizations fully supported the statements of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army and the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK issued on March 26.
					 The Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK on March 28 expressed great concern over the grave situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It said the military provocation by the south Korean authorities and the forces supporting them are pushing the situation of not only Asia but the rest of the world to a danger line.
					
					 Any form of aggression moves against the DPRK would face a strong counterattack though they are committed under whatever pretexts. 
					
					 The Korean people will firmly protect the sovereignty of the country and dignity of the nation under the banner of the Juche idea and the Songun politics.
					
					 We call on the progressive mankind to lift their voices demanding a stop to reckless provocations against the DPRK so as to ensure global peace and stability.
					
					 The Russian Maritime Territorial Association for Friendship with Korea in a statement on March 29 said that the U.S. and its followers are kicking up a frantic racket on sanctions against the DPRK over its satellite launch and underground nuclear test.
					
					 The DPRK is strongly countering the UN Security Council's "resolutions on sanctions", regarding them as a threat to it, the statement noted, stressing the issue of the Korean Peninsula can be settled only when the safety of the DPRK is substantially guaranteed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia alimentos de cumpleanos a Kim In Ji
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia alimentos de cumpleanos a Kim In Ji
						
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio alimentos de cumpleanos a Kim In Ji, anciana longeva de cien anos de edad que vive en la cabeza del distrito de Phangyo de la provincia de Kangwon.
					Vivia maltratada y despreciada antes de la liberacion de la patria, pero comenzo a vivir felizmente siendo duena del pais y la tierra desde cuando el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung restaurara el pais en 1945.
					
					Trabajo intensamente por la patria socialista y no dejo de trabajar aun despues de ser jubilada.
					
					La abuela prefiere las comidas preparadas con hierbas comestibles del monte y los platos de soya y vive siempre con optimismo.

articles.title: RPDC ajustara los usos de instalaciones nucleares existentes, declara DGEA
articles.content:
RPDC ajustara los usos de instalaciones nucleares existentes, declara DGEA
						
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que el pleno de marzo de 2013 del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea presento la nueva linea estrategica de impulsar paralelamente la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares de acuerdo con la situacion creada y las demandas legitimas de la revolucion coreana en desarrollo, el portavoz de la Direccion General de la Energia Atomica de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 2 la siguiente respuesta a la ACNC:
					Segun la linea estrategica de impulsar paralelamente la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares, presentada en el historico pleno del Comite Central del PTC, el sector de energia atomica de la RPDC asume la importante tarea de contribuir activamente a resolver el problema de escasez de electricidad del pais mediante el desarrollo de la industria de energia nuclear independiente y de ampliar y consolidar en lo cualitativo y cuantitativo las fuerzas armadas nucleares hasta que se logre la desnuclearizacion del mundo entero. 
					
					Por ahora, la Direccion General de la Energia Atomica de la RPDC tomo la decision de ajustar los usos de las instalaciones nucleares existentes acorde a la linea arriba mencionada. 
					
					Para ese efecto, sera arreglado de nuevo y volvera a ponerse en funcionamiento el reactor moderado de grafito de 5MW, que habia sido paralizado en octubre de 2007 en virtud del acuerdo logrado en las conversaciones a 6 bandas, al igual que todas las instalaciones nucleares de Nyongbyon, incluso la fabrica de uranio enriquecido. 
					
					Esas labores se pondran de inmediato en practica.

articles.title: Presidente del CC del PSDC publica declaracion
articles.content:
Presidente del CC del PSDC publica declaracion
						
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea hizo publica el dia 2 una declaracion en apoyo a la decision importante tomada por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en la reunion operacional sobre el cumplimiento de la mision de fuego artillero de las fuerzas coheteriles estrategicas del EPC y a la declaracion especial del gobierno, los partidos politicos y las entidades de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea para ponerla en practica.
					La realidad de hoy exige a todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar a levantarse en la gigantesca resistencia popular para eliminar para siempre del globo terraqueo al imperialismo norteamericano y a los traidores proyanquis, senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					La nueva linea estrategica de desarrollar paralelamente la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares, presentada en el pleno de marzo de 2013 del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, es la revolucionaria y justa que ensena el atajo al maravilloso futuro de la nacion tras superar la grave situacion creada ahora.
					
					El Partido Social-Democrata de Corea cuyo ideal es la independencia esta bien convencido de que bajo la situacion de hoy, enfrentarse al chantaje nuclear de EE.UU. con el justo ataque nuclear y a la provocacion con la inmediata guerra de reunificacion de la patria es la solucion de la reunificacion y la salida de la nacion.
					
					Nuestras fuerzas armadas autodefensivas entraron en las acciones militares reales y las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas quedaron en el tiempo de guerra. Bajo la situacion dada, cualquier provocacion contra nuestra soberania y dignidad no se hara esperar el ataque fisico de la RPDC.
					
					Ante la realidad dura de hoy, los partidos politicos, las entidades y los habitantes del Sur de Corea deben distinguir correctamente quien es el perturbador de la paz y tomar parte activa, por encima de las diferencias de ideologias, opiniones politicas y creencias religiosas, en la justa lucha contra EE.UU. y los fanaticos conflictivos que tratan de usar la bomba nuclear.
					
					El CC del PSDC y todos sus militantes se esforzaran en todo lo posible para adelantar el dia en que se ponga punto final a la historia de confrontacion con EE.UU., que perdura de siglo en siglo, con las fuerzas unidas de toda la nacion.

articles.title: Religiosos apoyan la decision importante de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Religiosos apoyan la decision importante de Kim Jong Un
						
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ACNC) -- El CEC apoya totalmente la decision importante tomada por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, maximo representante de amor y confianza, en relacion con que entraron en etapa extremadamente grave las acciones agresivas anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de los imperialistas norteamericanos que violan la soberania y el maximo interes de ella.
					Asi subraya el vocero del Consejo Ecumenico de Corea (CEC) en su declaracion publicada el dia 2.
					
					Recogiendo la voluntad de todos los religiosos de la RPDC que aprecian mas la justicia y verdad que su vida, el documento exhorta a los compatriotas dentro y fuera del pais a levantarse como un solo hombre en la sagrada lucha patriotica contra la coaccion y arbitrariedad del imperialismo yanqui, bastion del mal, y por la paz y la justicia, y prosigue:
					
					Los que prefieren las llamas se queman en ellas y los que se dedican a las maldades seran castigados por el cielo.
					
					Los imperialistas yanquis y los gangsteres militares surcoreanos, que desean imponer desastres nucleares a la humanidad aspirante a la paz, son tipejos satanicos que moriran en la caldera de infierno.
					
					Respondamos al chantaje nuclear del imperialismo yanqui con el ataque nuclear despiadado y a la guerra agresiva con la gran y justa batalla de reunificacion de la patria!, esto es la respuesta rotunda y postura unanime de todos nuestros religiosos.
					
					Ahora, los creyentes, que desean sinceramente la paz y justicia, no deben quedarse en la inaccion, sino tendran que dedicar todo su cuerpo y alma a las acciones practicas contra los odiosos perturbadores de paz y provocadores de guerra.
					
					Manteniendo la conciencia de que la verdadera religion para materializar el amor, paz y justicia esta en el camino de defender la dignidad y soberania de la nacion, deberan expulsar una vez por todas del suelo surcoreano a las tropas agresoras norteamericanas, causa de desgracias y sufrimientos de toda indole.
					
					El CEC esta firmemente convencido de que las entidades religiosas y creyentes surcoreanos, deseosos del radiante porvenir de la nacion y la paz, se incorporaran unanimemente en la sagrada lucha patriotica por defender la justicia, bien conscientes de su mision.
